entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as teaching others the Shield Charm and Occlumency. His face is 'plump' and his expression is 'indifferent to injuries or accidents'. He is improving fast at magic.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione mastered the Shield Charm faster than Neville. She is not mentioned as having any other notable characteristics in this text.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is making progress at Occlumency during D.A. meetings. He mastered the Shield Charm slower than Hermione.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort's thoughts and moods are experienced by Harry as 'strange flashes'. His presence is felt through Harry's scar.

relationships.description: Hermione mastered the Shield Charm faster than Neville.
Neville is making progress at Occlumency during D.A. meetings, while Harry's sessions with Snape are not improving.
Voldemort's thoughts and moods are experienced by Harry as 'strange flashes'. His presence is felt through Harry's scar.
